title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a deadly encounter—facing a hidden world of flesh-eating creatures and inner conflict.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Blast through space in this 26‑episode neo‑noir classic—bounty hunters chase fame, fortune—and their pasts across a jazzy galaxy.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Experience humanity’s desperate fight to survive 75 episodes of epic titan battles, political intrigue, and shocking twists.

title: Your Lie in April
description: Emotional music & romance collide in this heartfelt 22‑episode tale about a piano prodigy who rediscovers life through a violinist’s song.

title: Made in Abyss
description: Experience the hauntingly beautiful adventure of a fearless girl and her robot friend in a mysterious abyss across 13 gripping episodes.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: Follow a powerful psychic teen battling spirits and his own emotions in this 25‑episode action‑comedy sensation.

title: One Piece
description: Set sail on an epic pirate adventure spanning 1,126+ episodes—this ongoing fantasy series is filled with high-seas adventure, unforgettable characters, and powerful story arcs.

title: Death Note
description: Enter a thrilling cat-and-mouse game between a genius detective and a teen with a deathly notebook—complete in just 37 gripping episodes.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Join Tanjiro’s heroic journey across 55 episodes of stunning visuals, demon battles, and emotional storytelling in this fantasy sensation.

title: Hunter x Hunter (2011)
description: Follow a determined young boy and his friends on an epic 148‑episode adventure through dangerous lands as they pursue dreams and confront darkness.

title: One-Punch Man
description: Meet Saitama—the hero who defeats any enemy with a single punch—in this hilarious and action-packed 24‑episode anime phenomenon.

title: My Hero Academia
description: Follow Deku and Class 1-A across 159 thrilling episodes as they train to become heroes in a world of superpowers and high-stakes battles.

title: Spirited Away
description: An enchanting film masterpiece where a young girl navigates an otherworldly bathhouse after being spirited away—deep fantasy in one 125‑minute feature.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: Explore existential themes and mecha action in this 26‑episode anime classic that reshaped the sci‑fi genre.

title: Tokyo Revengers
description: Time travel meets gang warfare in this emotional 24‑episode anime about past choices, loyalty, and redemption.

title: Haikyuu!!
description: Spike over emotion and teamwork across 85 episodes of thrilling volleyball matches and character-driven sports drama.

title: Fairy Tail
description: Join over 300 episodes of magic, friendship, and guild adventures in this long-running fantasy shōnen series.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Get trapped in a virtual MMORPG world and fight to survive in this action-packed 96‑episode isekai blockbuster.

title: Psycho-Pass
description: In a cyberpunk future, a 22‑episode thriller delves into crime, surveillance, and morality through law enforcement and AI.

title: Gintama
description: Laugh, cry, and battle across 201 episodes in this genre-bending fusion of comedy, action, and drama set in an alternate Edo period.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Unleash cursed energy in this 47‑episode supernatural action hit where Yuji Itadori battles deadly spirits to save humanity—and his own soul.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: A visually stunning 13‑episode journey of emotional healing as a former soldier learns to reconnect through heartfelt letters.

title: Erased
description: A 12‑episode mystery thriller where a man travels back in time to solve a kidnapping that impacted his childhood.

title: Toradora!
description: Experience 25 episodes of heartfelt high school romance, comedy, and friendship in this fan‑favorite shōjo classic.

title: Kaiju No. 8
description: Join Kafka Hibino as he transforms into a kaiju to battle monstrous threats in this action-packed ongoing sci-fi anime.

title: Dr. Stone
description: Humanity turns to stone—and 3,700 years later, science prodigy Senku launches a new civilization in this 53-episode science adventure.

title: The Apothecary Diaries
description: A sharp-witted girl solves royal mysteries with herbal knowledge in this beautiful 24-episode historical drama.

title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
description: An elf mage reflects on the meaning of life and legacy after her hero’s journey ends in this emotional fantasy saga.

title: Spy x Family
description: A spy, an assassin, and a telepath form the perfect fake family in this hilarious, heartwarming 37-episode hit anime.

title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
description: A jobless man reincarnates in a fantasy world—reborn with magic, regrets, and a second chance across 49 episodes.

title: My Hero Academia: Vigilantes
description: Set before the main series, this prequel follows street-level heroes defying the law to protect the people—anime adaptation rumored, not officially released yet.
